summary.para: Specifies the actions that can be performed against an item.

remarks.para: Sync Center queries the item for its capabilities through whenever the method is called.

summary.para: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_Icon flag.
The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_EventStore flag.
The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_ConflictStore flag.

The user is allowed to delete the item from the handler's folder. This can be used by an item to remove itself from the handler's sync set (for instance, remove a folder from the set of Offline Files). If this value is set, the Delete task is shown in the handler's folder when this item is selected.
The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_BrowseContent flag. If this value is set, the Browse Content task is added to the item's shortcut menu.
The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_QueryBeforeEnable flag.
The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_QueryBeforeDisable flag.
The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_QueryBeforeDelete flag.
A mask used to retrieve valid flags.
